metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5059 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the XPM imagerendering functionality of SDL2_image 2.0.4. A specially crafted XPM imagecan cause an integer overflow, allocating too small of a buffer. Thisbuffer can then be written out of bounds resulting in a heap overflow,ultimately ending in code execution. An attacker can display a speciallycrafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
